page.title: 09 ASH MOTHERS AND TODDLERS
page.content:
Mothers and Toddlers was started by{ {Julie Elliot,Wendy Pucket}and{Karen {Gough}.It is held at the Ash Pavilion in Main Street.It has been going for 5 years.The children can start as soon as they are born. It is held on Thursdays and costs 25p a week.The club is open from 10:30a.m. untill 12:00 noon.They have refreshments like coffee,squash and biscuits. The Mothers and Toddlers club goes on visits to Cricket St Thomas and they have a Christmas Party.While the mothers talk they have games that the children can play.
Sally Kempster,Sarah Bowen Charlotte Strange,Kelly Russell.
